mapper.select: SELECT company_no, company_name, company_info, company_meet, company_summary, company_email, company_status, company_delete, insert_time, update_time FROM company WHERE company_no = #{companyNo} AND company_delete = '0'

SELECT company_no, company_name, company_info, company_meet, company_summary, company_email, company_status, company_delete, insert_time, update_time FROM company WHERE
company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyName}, '%') AND
company_delete = '0'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company WHERE
company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyName}, '%') AND
company_delete = '0'
